title: Build a Todo API
description: Create a simple todo storage using bun:sqlite.
instructions: Create a todos table with id, title, and completed. Write functions to add a todo and list all todos.

hints.text: Use db.query(...).all() to get all rows as an array

commonMistakes.consequence: run() is for INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE and doesn't return rows
commonMistakes.correction: Use db.query(...).all() or db.prepare(...).all() for SELECT
